# 
```{r data cleaning, echo=FALSE,message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
#Load the required dataset from local csv
rec_effort<-read.csv(here::here("Recreational","mrip_effort_1981_2020_rec_trips_MA_NE.csv"), stringsAsFactors = T, fileEncoding = 'UTF-8-BOM')
#levels(rec_effort$State)


```
## Visualizing Recreational fishing effort

These records are Recreational Fisheries Statistics sourced from the [ Marine Recreational Information Program (MRIP) ](https://www.st.nmfs.noaa.gov/recreational-fisheries/data-and-documentation/queries/index) via NOAA Office of Science and Technology and are inclusive of all north and mid-Atlantic states. The records span from `r min(rec_effort$Year )` to `r max(rec_effort$Year) ` and are specific to the mode and location of effort. Effort is quantified as angler trips. Mode is divided into `r stringr::str_to_sentence(levels(rec_effort$Fishing.Mode))`.




```{r effort by single state, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
by_state_mode<-rec_effort %>% dplyr::group_by(State, Fishing.Mode, Year) %>% dplyr::summarise (total_trips= sum(Angler.Trips))

selected_state<- by_state_mode %>% dplyr::filter(State == params$State)
selected_state$Fishing.Mode<- stringr::str_to_sentence(selected_state$Fishing.Mode)
selected_state %>% ggplot2::ggplot(aes(x=Year, y=(total_trips/100000)))+ ggplot2::geom_line(aes(color = Fishing.Mode, linetype = Fishing.Mode),size=1.3)+ggtitle(params$State)+xlab("Year")+ylab("Annual recreational trips in 100,000 units")+theme_minimal()


```

```{r effort by location, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}

by_location<- rec_effort %>% dplyr::group_by(Year, Fishing.Area) %>% dplyr::summarise(Total_effort= sum(Angler.Trips))

by_location %>% ggplot2::ggplot(aes(x=Year, y=(zoo::rollmean(Total_effort/100000,4, na.pad=TRUE))))+ ggplot2::geom_line(aes(color = Fishing.Area, linetype = Fishing.Area),size=1.3)+ggtitle("Recreational Fishing effort by location ", subtitle = " 4 year rolling average")+xlab("Year")+ylab("Annual recreational trips in 100,000 units")+theme_minimal() #+
 #geom_line(aes(x = Year,
  #              y = Total_effort/100000,
   #             group = Fishing.Area))

  # + facet_grid(rows = vars(Fishing.Area))




```

```{r summary by state, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE,error=FALSE}
#group effort by state mode and year for first summary

by_state<-rec_effort %>% dplyr::group_by(State, Year) %>% dplyr::summarise (total_trips= sum(Angler.Trips))

by_state %>% ggplot2::ggplot(aes(x=Year, y=(zoo::rollmean(total_trips/100000,4, na.pad=TRUE))))+ggplot2::geom_line(aes(color = State, linetype = State), size=1.3)+ggtitle("Recreational Fishing effort by state ", subtitle = " 4 year rolling average")+xlab("Year")+ylab("Annual recreational trips in 100,000 units")+theme_minimal()
```
